mapper.select: SELECT s.user_no, s.sell_no, g.gym_name as alarm_title FROM BOOKING B , gym g , seller s WHERE B.BOOKING_NO = #{booking_no} and b.gym_no = g.gym_no and g.sell_no = s.sell_no
